rdf:Description.dc:title: Vision 2020 1989
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Anderson, Dennis L.
Alberta. Minister's Advisory Committee on the Future of Alberta Communities.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Municipal Affairs, Minister's Advisory Committee on the Future of Alberta Communities,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Minister of Municipal Affairs: Dennis L. Anderson.
Volumes 1-4 also entitled: Vision 2020: Technical resources, nos. 1-4. Accompanied by guide entitled: Discussion guide with trends summary for vision 2020 [gd.].

v. 1 Discussion guide in more detail (81 p.) -- v. 2 Trends guide for Vision 2020 (100 p.) -- v. 3 Compendium of trends selected by agencies of the Alberta Government (159 p.) -- v. 4 Guide for public involvement (60 p.) -- v. 5. Putting your vision to work, implementation guide (19 p.) -- v. 6. Discussion guide with trends summary for Vision 2020 (40 p.).
